sentences.en: " You'd soften up soon enough if I were Blacky.
sentences.cn: 小二黑一来管保你就软了!

sentences.en: Fry the onions until they soften.
Livy felt herself soften towards Caroline.
sentences.cn: 莉薇觉得自己对卡罗琳的态度变温和了。

sentences.en: Plastics will soften when exposed to heat.
sentences.cn: 塑料适当加热就可以软化.

sentences.en: Senator Sarbanes expressed concern that programs designed to soften the blow of unemployment are not working well.
sentences.cn: 旨在缓解失业冲击的项目进展得并不太顺利，参议员萨班斯对此表示关切。

sentences.en: Soften the butter mixture in a small saucepan.
sentences.cn: 在小平底锅里将黄油混合物化软。

sentences.en: The garden has an informal feel to soften the architectural lines of the conservatory.
sentences.cn: 花园有一种随意的风格，从而使温室的建筑轮廓显得柔和了。

sentences.en: The government has softened its stance on public spending.
sentences.cn: 政府对公共开支问题的态度软化了。

sentences.en: The more you soften a request, the more polite it becomes.
sentences.cn: 你愈使请求柔婉, 请求就愈变为客气.

sentences.en: The sleety frozen earth began to soften under thaw and the rain.
sentences.cn: 薄冰冻结的土地在春融雨淋之下漫漫地软化了.

sentences.en: The special cream will help to soften up your skin.
sentences.cn: 这种特制香脂有助于使皮肤柔软.

sentences.en: There were also pledges to soften the impact of the subsidy cuts on the poorer regions.
sentences.cn: 他们还承诺要减轻削减补贴给较贫困地区带来的影响。

sentences.en: This special cream will help to soften up our skin.
sentences.cn: 这种特殊的护肤霜有助于使皮肤变得柔软.

sentences.en: To soften a formal look, Caroline recommends ethnic blouses.
sentences.cn: 为了看上去不过于正式，卡罗琳建议穿有民族色彩的上衣。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, as a standard mattress wears, the springs soften and so do not support your spine.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，当一张标准床垫用旧后，弹簧就会变软而无法支撑你的脊椎。

sentences.en: Use moisturizer to soften your skin.
sentences.cn: 使用润肤霜让你的肌肤变柔滑。
